Text:
The subs for episode 1 are good now. They could always need some fine tuning though.

Enjoy, and please help out.
The episode 2 subs are good to go! Please make some corrections after watching.

Jag kan inte få undertexterna att fungera? Det funkar på datorn med VLC men när jag bränner på DVD så finns inga undertexter när jag ska titta. Vad gör jag för fel?
Den här serien har jag längtat så länge efter så tack tack aajkd i vilket fall!
Subs for e1- 4 are good to go.. but not much community spirit here.

Have a look at the series uploaded by kchase77:

http://thepiratebay.org/user/kchase77/

Thanks for the series, it looks like it has all the hallmarks of being quite thrilling?  The English subtitles are fairly wayward, but the story seems to make it worth the effort of continuing to watch it?
Thank-you for your generosity and kindness 'aajkd', not many like you out there!! :)
